ccrp.gun.p90.desc: Is that fair? Of course NOT, dude!

§3C.C.R.P§f x §4Rhodes Koei
LC2808,
Kill me, then you can survive
ccrp.gun.type_95_longbow.desc: I am a defender of my motherland
ccrp.gun.mp9_modernrized.desc: I want to change the foregrip like changing clothes!
ccrp.gun.aug_para.desc: Easy conversion, no reduction in firepower
ccrp.gun.p90.desc: Lightweight, graceful, and powerful, she dances in the eyes of conflicting typhoons
ccrp.gun.p90_paw.desc: Please listen to his sound of tearing armor and flesh and blood apart
ccrp.gun.x95r.desc: What? Nono, I'm not Tavor now
ccrp.gun.x95_smg.desc: Is that work? Sure it worked!
ccrp.gun.ar57.desc: Ammo feed direction, check! Bore diameter, check!
ccrp.gun.mk18_mjolnir.desc: Listen to me, my friend, that was just a fleeting moment.
ccrp.gun.mcx_spear_tombstone.desc: Fully locked allows all the power of gunpowder to be fed back to the shooter's shoulder!
ccrp.gun.sig277.desc:
Handguard Kit.
Successfully mitigated chamber overpressure challenges and managed recoil forces.
ccrp.gun.m14ebr.desc: Discussing her weight is strictly forbidden.
ccrp.gun.mp5_sd.desc: Quietly shoot the enemy's head into a beehive!
ccrp.gun.am17.desc: Never say she's a product of archaeology
ccrp.gun.mcx_virtus.desc: The Beginning of a Legendary Gun Family
ccrp.gun.m27_iar.desc: Navy is giving us strange names again...
ccrp.gun.m38_spr.desc: Accurate, fatal... huh? Has this kind of introduction already been used?
ccrp.gun.qbz_191.desc: Train hard and defend the motherland.
ccrp.gun.qbu_191.desc: When necessary, fully automatic shooting can also be performed.
ccrp.gun.cslr_42a.desc: Are you saying, an assault rifle from China that can shoot NATO standard rifle bullets?
ccrp.gun.cslr_43a.desc: It seems like there's a §cRED GIANT §flooking at you through this gun
ccrp.gun.cslr_44.desc: A more powerful Chinese external rifle
ccrp.gun.fightlite_scr_hg.desc: P I S T O L
ccrp.gun.m1014.desc: You can open the door yourself, or I can use this to blast you and the door into pieces!

§3C.C.R.P§f x §2LesRaisins
§fI am old, but I can still fight.

Vector produced by Cima Arms Modification Group, shooting 7.62x51mmbullets.
§6Rättvisa means justice
ccrp.gun.mp5k_pdw.desc: With a firing rate of up to 900 rounds per minute, it can easily tear apart any flesh and blood that dares to block the way!

§3C.C.R.P§f x §bAstralLin
§fOh my god, it's a bigger mastiff!

 Decisively demonstrated its battlefield superiority during the 2031 Kastovia Conflict.

§3C.C.R.P§f x §bLonelyBoy
§fYes, yes, of course I know it's a machine gun.
